commit.message:
Introduce src/reverse_iterator.hpp and include it...

...where it will be needed

Taken from https://gist.github.com/arvidsson/7231973 with small
modifications to fit the bitcoin core project

tree 55acdf3fb3461030a5dde793c3064d5a27a079c8
parent 1ad3d4e1261f4a444d982a1470c257c78233bda3
author Jorge Timón <jtimon@jtimon.cc> 1492035880 +0200
committer Jorge Timón <jtimon@jtimon.cc> 1498096122 +0200

Introduce src/reverse_iterator.hpp and include it...

...where it will be needed

Taken from https://gist.github.com/arvidsson/7231973 with small
modifications to fit the bitcoin core project

files.patch:
@@ -124,6 +124,7 @@ BITCOIN_CORE_H = \
   pow.h \
   protocol.h \
   random.h \
+  reverse_iterator.h \
   reverselock.h \
   rpc/blockchain.h \
   rpc/client.h \

commit.message:
scripted-diff: Remove BOOST_REVERSE_FOREACH

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i 's/BOOST_REVERSE_FOREACH(\(.*\), \(.*\))/for (\1 : reverse_iterate(\2))/' ./src/*.h ./src/*.cpp ./src/*/*.h ./src/*/*.cpp ;
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

commit.message:
scripted-diff: Remove #include <boost/foreach.hpp>

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/#include <boost\/foreach.hpp>\n//' ./src/*.h ./src/*.cpp ./src/*/*.h ./src/*/*.cpp ./src/*/*/*.h ./src/*/*/*.cpp
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

verification.payload:
tree b456ccac0b36fcc95dd4dce3cd4d0f8696e11c74
parent 5995735c5be19bee4c5369bd1861e913cf201db7
author Jorge Timón <jtimon@jtimon.cc> 1496349342 +0200
committer Jorge Timón <jtimon@jtimon.cc> 1498096134 +0200

clang-format: Delete ForEachMacros

files.patch:
@@ -23,7 +23,6 @@ ContinuationIndentWidth: 4
 Cpp11BracedListStyle: true
 DerivePointerAlignment: false
 DisableFormat:   false
-ForEachMacros:   [ foreach, Q_FOREACH, BOOST_FOREACH, BOOST_REVERSE_FOREACH ]
 IndentCaseLabels: false
 IndentFunctionDeclarationAfterType: false
 IndentWidth:     4
